mapper.select: select s.syllabusName, c.courseStart, c.courseEnd, ct.courseTake_State, ct.surveyYN, c.courseID, m.userID, s.syllabusID, m.userName from course_Take ct join kt_user m on (ct.userID = m.userId) join course c on (c.courseid=ct.courseid) join syllabus s on (s.syllabusid = c.syllabusid) where ct.courseTake_State = '수료' order by courseTake_ApplyDate desc
